titleStmt.title: Heavenly knowledg directing a Christian to ye assurance of his salvation in this life / written in Latin by Barthol. Keckerm. ; done into English by T.V.
titleStmt.author: Keckermann, Bartholomäus, ca. 1571-1608 or 9.
Vicars, Thomas. Treatise written to the glory of gods grace, against free-will.

notesStmt.note: Pages 28, 293 and 295 misnumbered as 26, 263 and 195 respectively.
Includes: A treatise written to the glory of gods grace, against free-will / by T.V.
Imperfect: print show-through and tightly bound with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University. Library.
